Method.name: Load
Method.Description: Load posts of topic with ExtId <var>topic</var> <var>amount</var> = "a" - all - if we can load all pages for one time, or number of pages of posts of topic

Method.name: Scan
Method.Description: scan across all forum posts pages
Method.Implementation:
#define g(%prop) $g(data(%prop))
s topic = $$$g("topic") s pagesAmount = $$$g("pages")
if +pagesAmount = 0 { ;pagesAmount = "a" - all
s page = ..GetPage( topic, pagesAmount, .sc ) Q:'sc
s page.firstPost=1 ; if = 1 then it's the first post of topic
s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc sc
} else { ;pagesAmount - numeric
s i = 1 s page = ..GetPage( topic, i, .sc ) Q:'sc ;creating <object>page</object> with Http.Response and load page #1 in parser
s page.firstPost=1 ; if = 1 then it's the first post of topic
s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc
#; Load and parse pages from 1 to <var>pagesAmount</var> for { s i = i + 1 Q:i>pagesAmount
s sc = page.Get( , i ) Q:'sc ;load page #i in parser s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc } }
Q sc

Method.name: OnPost
Method.Description: Event handler <var>data</var> - key-value array If handler return 0, parsing will be interrupted
Method.Implementation:
Q:'##class(Topic).ExtIdExists( ..Topic, .topicId ) 0 s data("Topic") = topicId ;set parent
s sc = ##class(Post).Insert( .data ) Q:'sc sc
if ..firstPost { ;first post's date is the date of topic's creation
s topicObj = ##class(Topic).%OpenId(topicId) s topicObj.Posted = $g(data("Posted")) s sc = topicObj.%Save() Q:'sc sc s ..firstPost = 0
}
Q sc
